name: .BCKP File Extension
summary: Learn about .BCKP files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Archive of unsafe or questionable files detected by Ad-Aware, a malware protection program for PCs and networks; collects possible malicious files and quarantines them to a safe location; created during the auto-quarantine process.

content: BCKP files are typically named "[date] [time].bckp" where [date] is the datestamp and [time] is the time the file was created.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
